FAQ

AutoCons

  1. What is an AutoCon?
    For the purpose of this FAQ page, an AutoCon is an Autobot body with a Decepticon head, or a Decepticon body with an Autobot head.
  2. Which card effects can target an AutoCon?
    Any effect that refers to a Decepticon or an Autobot. Here is a roughly complete list:
    • Decepticon Crown
    • Noble's Blaster
    • Scoundrel's Blaster
    • Press the Advantage
    • Electro-Optical Visor
    • Trithyllium Shield
    • Turn the Tide
    • Deadlock - Soldier Of Fortune (alt mode)
    • Octone - Capricious Agitator (alt modes)
    • Backfire
    • Even the Score
    • Opportune Offensive
    • Overwhelming Advantage
    • Pincer Movement
    • Callous Leadership
    • HV Electron Breacher
    • Field Repair
    • Magnetic Dysfunction Ray would do an extra damage to an AutoCon
    • Daring Escape
    • Opportune Repairs
    • Heroic Team-Up
    • Skullsmasher - Swamp Warrior (alt mode)
    • Optimus Prime - Freedom Fighter (alt mode)
    • Sky Shadow - Elite Warrior (combined mode)
    • Heroic Resolve
    • Step Forward
    • Emergency Repair Patch
    • Compact Shield
    • Ultra Magnus Armor
    • Matrix of Leadership
    • Energon Mace
  3. Which cards can I not use if I have an AutoCon on my starting team?
    Any effect that refers to having "only Decepticon characters" or "only Autobot characters", or any card that refers to a Decepticon or an Autobot negatively ("Can't be put on Decepticons" for example). Here is a roughly complete list:
    • The second part of Swindled
    • Villainous Spotlight
    • Heroic Spotlight
    • Unflinching Courage
    • The second part of Frag Toss
    • The second part of Confidence
    • Bad Attitude (though you can damage an opponent AutoCon with Bad Attitude)
    • The second part of Diagnosis
    • Terrifying Resilience
  4. How does Soldier's Blaster work with AutoCons?
    • An Autobot has a Soldier's Blaster. It gets a +2 attack against a Decepticon, a Mercenary, or an AutoCon.
    • A Decepticon has a Soldier's Blaster. It gets a +2 attack against an Autobot, Mercenary, or an AutoCon.
    • A Merc has a Soldier's Blaster. It gets a +2 attack against an Autobot, Decepticon, or an AutoCon.
    • An AutoCon has a Soldier's Blaster. It gets +2 attack only against a Mercenary.
